sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./App.css"; // Import the CSS file function App() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ gender: "", age: "", hypertension: "", heart_disease: "", ever_married: "", work_type: "", Residence_type: "", avg_glucose_level: "", bmi: "", smoking_status: "", }); const [prediction, setPrediction] = useState(null); // State for storing prediction result const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const response = await fetch("http://localhost:5000/predict", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify(formData), }); const result = await response.json(); console.log("Response:", result); // Set the result in the state to display it on the page setPrediction(result.stroke); }; return (

Stroke Prediction

{/* Gender */}
{/* Age */}
{/* Hypertension */}
{/* Heart Disease */}
{/* Ever Married */}
{/* Work Type */}
{/* Residence Type */}
{/* Avg Glucose Level */}
{/* BMI */}
{/* Smoking Status */}
{/* Enhanced Result Display - Moved inside form-container */} {prediction !== null && (

Prediction Result

{prediction ? ( ⚠️ ) : ( ✅ )} {prediction ? 'Higher Risk of Stroke Detected' : 'Lower Risk of Stroke Detected'}

{prediction ? 'Please consult with a healthcare provider for proper medical evaluation.' : 'Continue maintaining a healthy lifestyle and regular check-ups.'}

)}
); } export default App;
